bullet_pts: Implementation of Next.js and server-side rendering
Skills displayed in a different format (e.g network graphs, maps or other D3.js visualization charts
paragraph:
Hi! I'm Riyad and I do Front-End Development and UX Design. My Multidiscplinary degree has allowed me to delve into both the arts and the computing world as they're very much intertwined thanks to the Internet. 

 I made this website with React JS, in a social media style newsfeed format. You can scroll down below to see my projects from university and the projects I am currently working on as well in brief, if you'd like to learn more, I'd love to discuss it over Zoom or Google Meet! 

I am always trying to keep myself occupied with projects whether they succeed or fail, it helps me learn from my mistakes and grow from there.

 There is a few things I want to create for this portfolio while working on my other side projects such as:
